name: PicoCross (threesided)
description:
Overview

PicoCross is a fun take on picross puzzles, built with Pico-8 the best fantasy 8-bit console there is! There are 64 levels in total, each with a unique 8x8 pixel art drawn by yours truly.

Controls:

While in a level: 

z - Confirm/toggle tile placement

x - Remove/toggle tile block marker

z+x - Quit level and go back to level select screen
